sourcesContent:
import React, { useMemo, useState } from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Button, Form, Badge, Table, ProgressBar, Alert } from 'react-bootstrap'; const activeSeed = [ { id: 'promo-001', name: 'Holiday Flash Sale', type: 'Percentage', value: 20, startDate: '2025-11-20', endDate: '2025-11-27', performance: 68, status: 'Running' }, { id: 'promo-002', name: 'Buy 2 Get 1 Free - Coffee Beans', type: 'Bundle', value: 3, startDate: '2025-10-01', endDate: '2025-10-31', performance: 82, status: 'Running' } ]; const draftSeed = [ { id: 'draft-001', name: 'New Year Mega Deal', idea: 'Sitewide 15% off for the first 48 hours of 2026' }, { id: 'draft-002', name: 'VIP Loyalty Surprise', idea: 'Extra 10% and free shipping for loyalty tier Gold+' } ]; const SellerPromotionPage = () => { const [activePromotions, setActivePromotions] = useState(activeSeed); const [drafts, setDrafts] = useState(draftSeed); const [formState, setFormState] = useState({ title: '', type: 'percentage', discount: '', minSpend: '', startDate: '', endDate: '', audience: 'all-customers', description: '' }); const [alert, setAlert] = useState(''); const upcomingPromotion = useMemo(() => { return activePromotions .map(entry => ({ ...entry, start: new Date(entry.startDate) })) .filter(entry => entry.start >= new Date()) .sort((a, b) => a.start - b.start)[0]; }, [activePromotions]); const handleChange = (event) => { const { name, value } = event.target; setFormState(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const handleCreatePromotion = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); if (!formState.title || !formState.startDate || !formState.endDate) { setAlert('Please fill in the required fields to launch a promotion.'); return; } const newPromotion = { id: `promo-${Date.now()}`, name: formState.title, type: formState.type === 'percentage' ? 'Percentage' : formState.type === 'amount' ? 'Fixed Amount' : 'Bundle', value: Number(formState.discount) || 0, startDate: formState.startDate, endDate: formState.endDate, performance: 0, status: 'Scheduled' }; setActivePromotions(prev => [newPromotion, ...prev]); setAlert('Promotion created! Review and activate it when you are ready.'); setFormState({ title: '', type: 'percentage', discount: '', minSpend: '', startDate: '', endDate: '', audience: 'all-customers', description: '' }); }; const handlePromoteDraft = (draftId) => { const draft = drafts.find(entry => entry.id === draftId); if (!draft) return; setFormState(prev => ({ ...prev, title: draft.name, description: draft.idea })); setDrafts(prev => prev.filter(entry => entry.id !== draftId)); }; return (

Design irresistible campaigns and boost conversions across your storefront.

{upcomingPromotion && (
Next scheduled launch
{upcomingPromotion.name}
)} {alert && ( setAlert('')} className="shadow-sm"> {alert} )}

Monitor live promotions and adapt in real time.

{entry.name}
{entry.startDate}
to {entry.endDate} 		{entry.type} = 75 ? 'success' : entry.performance >= 40 ? 'warning' : 'danger'} label={`${entry.performance}%`} /> {entry.status}

{drafts.length === 0 ? (

All your promotion ideas have been moved into planning.

) : ( drafts.map(draft => (
{draft.name}

{draft.idea}

 )) )} ); }; export default SellerPromotionPage;
